summary: Contains unit tests that verify the functionality and robustness of various swap strategies used in the Qiskit transpiler, including line-based swaps and generic strategies, by checking configuration handling, distance calculations, permutation logic, layer sizing, connection updates, perâ€‘qubit swap limits, edge generation, full connectivity achievement, and proper exception raising for invalid inputs.
business_intent: Guarantee that swap strategy components correctly map quantum circuits onto hardware coupling maps, preventing errors during compilation and ensuring optimal routing for quantum devices.
